Name: Drone Hero
About the game: Feel like the world's best drone pilot. People say they love the steering. 25 challenges with increasing difficulty. Local pass-and-play multiplayer, great for parties. Designed for VR but can also be played on a regular screen with keyboard or gamepad. CREATED WITH LOVE BY NEUSTON Neuston is a game studio that focuses on creating super-tight action games. SEIZURE WARNING A small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns. Immediately stop playing and consult a doctor if you experience any symptoms.
